actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to direct the head of each executive agency to issue regulations which require that a telephone number for such agency or major subdivision thereof be included on all letterhead stationary utilized by such agency or major subdivision.

summary.text: Directs the head of each executive agency to issue regulations which require that a telephone number for such agency or major subdivision thereof be included on all letterhead stationary utilized by such agency or major subdivision.

titles.title: A bill to direct the head of each executive agency to issue regulations which require that a telephone number for such agency or major subdivision thereof be included on all letterhead stationary utilized by such agency or major subdivision.
